attributes.action: amend the remit of the Press Complaints Commission to allow investigations into news articles which cause great public outcry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent article in the Daily Mail newspaper by Jan Moir regarding Stephen Gately's death caused Massive public outcry causing the PCC website to actually crash due to the shear volume of traffic. (Over 1,000 complaints)

The PCC sent out auto responses claiming that it would not investigate the complaint unless the complainant is personally involved in the case. 

The remarks in the above mentioned articles caused offence on so many levels to so many people and I believe the PCC should have greater powers to investigate and punish organisations for such items if breaches of their own code are found.
